lines.text: If you lose this job, its curtains. There isn't another paper in town that will take you back, and I mean that Joe.
Yeah, well, maybe somebody will start a new paper!
You look to me like a married man - are you?
Well, you know how it is... gotta go through it once, like the measles, but i aint working at it now.
There's no use trying to stop me. Mr. Lopez and I were meant for each other. We're soul mates.
You are. How many soul mates does this guy got?
